info.title: Messaging Service
info.description: You can send and receive the following request and response to broadcast messages across servers of your experience. For information on the usage of the API, see [Messaging Usage Guide](../../../cloud/open-cloud/usage-messaging.md).

post.description: Publish a message to a pre-defined topic of an experience, with the size of the message up to 1,024 characters (1 KB). Requires the **Publish** permission for API keys and the **universe-messaging-service:publish** scope for OAuth 2.0 apps. See [Cross-Server Messaging](../../../cloud-services/cross-server-messaging.md#subscribe-users-to-receive-messages) for defining and subscribing users to a topic.

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience in which you want to send your messages to. You can [copy your experience's Universe ID](../../../cloud/open-cloud/usage-messaging.md#publishing-messages-to-live-servers) on **Creator Dashboard**.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic that you want to publish your message to, with up to 80 characters.

401.description: The API key is not valid for this operation / You don't have the authorization.

403.description: Publishing is not allowed on this experience.

PublishRequest.description: The request body object with the message string that you want to publish to the live server.

message.description: The message content that you want to publish to the live server.
